events.name: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_label: Zelenskiy meets US Congressional delegation in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation in Kyiv, promising continued support in the war against Russia.

events.name: Zelenskiy’s meeting
events.wd_description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.
events.description: President Zelenskiy met with a senior US Congressional delegation, including Adam Smith, chair of the House Armed Services Committee.

events.name: US delegation’s statement
events.wd_description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.
events.description: The US delegation stated that the United States, along with allies and partners, has provided economic, military, and humanitarian assistance to Ukraine.

events.name: additional military aid
events.wd_description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.
events.description: US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin announced the provision of four additional high mobility artillery rocket systems to Ukraine, bringing the total provided so far to 16.

events.name: President Biden's address at the Arab summit
events.wd_label: President Biden's address at the Arab summit
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden addressed the Arab summit, affirming the United States' commitment to being an active partner in the Middle East and urging leaders to view human rights as a catalyst for economic and social change.
events.description: President Joe Biden addressed the Arab summit, affirming the United States' commitment to being an active partner in the Middle East and urging leaders to view human rights as a catalyst for economic and social change.

events.name: Biden's commitment
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden emphasized that the United States would remain an active and engaged partner in the Middle East, highlighting the importance of human rights.
events.description: President Joe Biden emphasized that the United States would remain an active and engaged partner in the Middle East, highlighting the importance of human rights.

events.name: focus of Biden's Middle East trip
events.wd_label: focus of Biden's Middle East trip
events.wd_description: Biden's first trip to the Middle East as President focused on the summit with six Gulf states, Egypt, Jordan, and Iraq, downplaying a meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
events.description: Biden's first trip to the Middle East as President focused on the summit with six Gulf states, Egypt, Jordan, and Iraq, downplaying a meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.

events.name: goal of the Saudi Arabia visit
events.wd_label: goal of the Saudi Arabia visit
events.wd_description: Biden's visit to Saudi Arabia aimed to strike a deal on oil production to help reduce gasoline prices and combat inflation.
events.description: Biden's visit to Saudi Arabia aimed to strike a deal on oil production to help reduce gasoline prices and combat inflation.

events.name: School shooting in Izhevsk, Russia
events.wd_description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.
events.description: A gunman opened fire at a school in Izhevsk, central Russia, killing at least 15 people and injuring 24, including 11 children. The gunman, a former student of the school, killed himself at the scene.

events.name: casualties
events.wd_description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.
events.description: Eleven children and four adults, including two security guards and two teachers, were killed in the shooting, and 24 others were injured, with only two of them not being children.

events.name: panic inside the school
events.wd_description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.
events.description: Video footage showed panic inside the building, with children and adults running along the corridors and blood seen on the floor of a classroom, with children crouching underneath desks.

events.name: details of the incident
events.wd_description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.
events.description: The gunman, a former student of the school, opened fire at the school with about 1,000 pupils in the city of Izhevsk and then killed himself at the scene.

events.name: EV battery supply chain transformation under the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022
events.wd_label: EV battery supply chain transformation under the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 aims to spur EV adoption by providing tax credits, but its success depends on overcoming the current reliance on battery materials and components from China.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 aims to spur EV adoption by providing tax credits, but its success depends on overcoming the current reliance on battery materials and components from China.

events.name: tax credit requirements
events.wd_description: To qualify for the tax credit, EV batteries and key minerals must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, with increasing percentages over time.
events.description: To qualify for the tax credit, EV batteries and key minerals must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, with increasing percentages over time.

events.name: t: critical minerals sourcing
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, 40% of critical minerals in EV batteries must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, increasing to 80% by 2026.
events.description: Starting in 2023, 40% of critical minerals in EV batteries must be sourced from the US or free-trade partners, increasing to 80% by 2026.

events.name: t: battery manufacturing location
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, 50% of battery components must be manufactured or assembled in North America, reaching 100% by 2029.
events.description: Starting in 2023, 50% of battery components must be manufactured or assembled in North America, reaching 100% by 2029.

events.name: t: exclusion of foreign entities of concern
events.wd_label: t: exclusion of foreign entities of concern
events.wd_description: From 2024, any mining, processing, or manufacturing by a foreign entity of concern will disqualify a vehicle from tax credits, with this requirement extending to critical minerals in 2025.
events.description: From 2024, any mining, processing, or manufacturing by a foreign entity of concern will disqualify a vehicle from tax credits, with this requirement extending to critical minerals in 2025.

events.name: challenges in sourcing materials
events.wd_description: The reliance on China for lithium-ion battery cells and critical minerals poses a significant challenge to meeting the tax credit requirements.
events.description: The reliance on China for lithium-ion battery cells and critical minerals poses a significant challenge to meeting the tax credit requirements.

events.name: t: China's dominance in battery materials
events.wd_label: t: China's dominance in battery materials
events.wd_description: China currently produces 80% of lithium-ion battery cells and dominates the supply chain for critical minerals, making it difficult for the US to source these materials domestically.
events.description: China currently produces 80% of lithium-ion battery cells and dominates the supply chain for critical minerals, making it difficult for the US to source these materials domestically.

events.name: t: difficulty in sourcing specific minerals
events.wd_label: t: difficulty in sourcing specific minerals
events.wd_description: Sourcing minerals like graphite, lithium, and nickel is challenging due to processing locations and lack of free-trade agreements with key suppliers.
events.description: Sourcing minerals like graphite, lithium, and nickel is challenging due to processing locations and lack of free-trade agreements with key suppliers.

events.name: t: time required to establish new mines
events.wd_label: t: time required to establish new mines
events.wd_description: Building new mining operations can take upwards of seven years, making it difficult to quickly increase domestic supply of critical minerals.
events.description: Building new mining operations can take upwards of seven years, making it difficult to quickly increase domestic supply of critical minerals.

events.name: impact on EV sales
events.wd_description: The tax credits could have a limited impact on EV sales in the near term due to the challenges in meeting the new requirements.
events.description: The tax credits could have a limited impact on EV sales in the near term due to the challenges in meeting the new requirements.

events.name: t: uncertainty of US companies' response
events.wd_label: t: uncertainty of US companies' response
events.wd_description: It is uncertain how quickly US companies will be able to scale up production and sourcing to meet the new requirements.
events.description: It is uncertain how quickly US companies will be able to scale up production and sourcing to meet the new requirements.

events.name: t: limited short-term impact
events.wd_description: The tax credits might not significantly boost EV sales in the near term if qualifying batteries and minerals are in short supply.
events.description: The tax credits might not significantly boost EV sales in the near term if qualifying batteries and minerals are in short supply.

events.name: support programs
events.wd_description: Other supporting programs in the Inflation Reduction Act, like production tax credits and loans for building new factories, are crucial to transforming the supply chain.
events.description: Other supporting programs in the Inflation Reduction Act, like production tax credits and loans for building new factories, are crucial to transforming the supply chain.

events.name: t: production tax credits
events.wd_description: Production tax credits in the Inflation Reduction Act support domestic battery manufacturing.
events.description: Production tax credits in the Inflation Reduction Act support domestic battery manufacturing.

events.name: t: loans for new factories
events.wd_description: Loans for building new factories are essential to establishing a robust domestic battery supply chain.
events.description: Loans for building new factories are essential to establishing a robust domestic battery supply chain.
